name: Business Process & Workflow Sprites
description: Comprehensive sprite library for business process modeling, workflow diagrams, decision points, and organizational elements

processes.name: Process Elements
processes.description: Core business process activities and operations

process-task.name: Process Task
process-task.description: Standard business process task or activity
process-task.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="120" height="60" rx="8" fill="#3b82f6" stroke="#2563eb" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="8" y="8" width="104" height="44" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><rect x="15" y="20" width="90" height="4" rx="2" fill="#3b82f6" opacity="0.3"/><rect x="15" y="30" width="70" height="4" rx="2" fill="#3b82f6" opacity="0.3"/><rect x="15" y="40" width="80" height="4" rx="2" fill="#3b82f6" opacity="0.3"/><text x="60" y="18" text-anchor="middle" font-size="10" fill="#2563eb" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Process Task</text>

subprocess.name: Subprocess
subprocess.description: Subprocess or sub-workflow with expansion indicator
subprocess.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="120" height="60" rx="8" fill="#7c3aed" stroke="#6d28d9" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="8" y="8" width="104" height="44" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><rect x="15" y="20" width="90" height="4" rx="2" fill="#7c3aed" opacity="0.3"/><rect x="15" y="30" width="70" height="4" rx="2" fill="#7c3aed" opacity="0.3"/><rect x="15" y="40" width="80" height="4" rx="2" fill="#7c3aed" opacity="0.3"/><rect x="50" y="45" width="20" height="8" rx="2" fill="#7c3aed"/><text x="60" y="18" text-anchor="middle" font-size="10" fill="#6d28d9" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Subprocess</text><text x="60" y="51" text-anchor="middle" font-size="8" fill="#ffffff" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">+</text>

manual-task.name: Manual Task
manual-task.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="120" height="60" rx="8" fill="#f59e0b" stroke="#d97706" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="8" y="8" width="104" height="44" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><path d="M20 15 L25 10 L30 15 L35 10 L40 15 L45 10 L50 15" stroke="#f59e0b" stroke-width="2" fill="none"/><rect x="15" y="25" width="90" height="4" rx="2" fill="#f59e0b" opacity="0.3"/><rect x="15" y="35" width="70" height="4" rx="2" fill="#f59e0b" opacity="0.3"/><rect x="15" y="45" width="80" height="4" rx="2" fill="#f59e0b" opacity="0.3"/><text x="60" y="23" text-anchor="middle" font-size="10" fill="#d97706" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Manual Task</text>

service-task.name: Service Task
service-task.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="120" height="60" rx="8" fill="#10b981" stroke="#059669" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="8" y="8" width="104" height="44" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><rect x="15" y="12" width="12" height="8" rx="2" fill="#10b981"/><rect x="15" y="25" width="90" height="4" rx="2" fill="#10b981" opacity="0.3"/><rect x="15" y="35" width="70" height="4" rx="2" fill="#10b981" opacity="0.3"/><rect x="15" y="45" width="80" height="4" rx="2" fill="#10b981" opacity="0.3"/><text x="60" y="18" text-anchor="middle" font-size="10" fill="#059669" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Service Task</text>

decisions.name: Decision Points
decisions.description: Decision gateways, conditions, and branching logic

exclusive-gateway.name: Exclusive Gateway
exclusive-gateway.description: XOR gateway for exclusive decision branching
exclusive-gateway.svg: <polygon points="40,10 70,40 40,70 10,40" fill="#fbbf24" stroke="#f59e0b" stroke-width="2"/><polygon points="40,18 62,40 40,62 18,40" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><text x="40" y="45" text-anchor="middle" font-size="16" fill="#f59e0b" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Ã—</text>

inclusive-gateway.name: Inclusive Gateway
inclusive-gateway.description: OR gateway for inclusive decision branching
inclusive-gateway.svg: <polygon points="40,10 70,40 40,70 10,40" fill="#8b5cf6" stroke="#7c3aed" stroke-width="2"/><polygon points="40,18 62,40 40,62 18,40" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><circle cx="40" cy="40" r="8" fill="none" stroke="#7c3aed" stroke-width="2"/>

parallel-gateway.name: Parallel Gateway
parallel-gateway.description: AND gateway for parallel process branching
parallel-gateway.svg: <polygon points="40,10 70,40 40,70 10,40" fill="#10b981" stroke="#059669" stroke-width="2"/><polygon points="40,18 62,40 40,62 18,40" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><path d="M40 25 L40 55 M25 40 L55 40" stroke="#059669" stroke-width="3" stroke-linecap="round"/>

event-gateway.name: Event Gateway
event-gateway.svg: <polygon points="40,10 70,40 40,70 10,40" fill="#ef4444" stroke="#dc2626" stroke-width="2"/><polygon points="40,18 62,40 40,62 18,40" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><polygon points="40,25 45,35 35,35" fill="#dc2626"/><circle cx="40" cy="45" r="6" fill="none" stroke="#dc2626" stroke-width="2"/>

events.name: Events
events.description: Start events, end events, and intermediate events

start-event.name: Start Event
start-event.description: Process start event with thin border
start-event.svg: <circle cx="30" cy="30" r="25" fill="#34d399" stroke="#10b981" stroke-width="2"/><circle cx="30" cy="30" r="18" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><text x="30" y="35" text-anchor="middle" font-size="10" fill="#059669" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">START</text>

end-event.name: End Event
end-event.description: Process end event with thick border
end-event.svg: <circle cx="30" cy="30" r="25" fill="#f87171" stroke="#ef4444" stroke-width="4"/><circle cx="30" cy="30" r="18" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><text x="30" y="35" text-anchor="middle" font-size="10" fill="#dc2626" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">END</text>

intermediate-event.name: Intermediate Event
intermediate-event.svg: <circle cx="30" cy="30" r="25" fill="#fbbf24" stroke="#f59e0b" stroke-width="2"/><circle cx="30" cy="30" r="20" fill="none" stroke="#f59e0b" stroke-width="2"/><circle cx="30" cy="30" r="15" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><text x="30" y="35" text-anchor="middle" font-size="8" fill="#d97706" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">EVENT</text>

actors.name: Actors & Roles
actors.description: People, roles, systems, and organizational units

person.name: Person/User
person.svg: <circle cx="40" cy="25" r="15" fill="#60a5fa" stroke="#3b82f6" stroke-width="2"/><circle cx="40" cy="20" r="8" fill="#ffffff"/><path d="M32 32 Q40 28 48 32 Q48 45 40 50 Q32 45 32 32" fill="#ffffff"/><circle cx="37" cy="18" r="2" fill="#3b82f6"/><circle cx="43" cy="18" r="2" fill="#3b82f6"/><path d="M35 22 Q40 25 45 22" stroke="#3b82f6" stroke-width="1" fill="none"/><text x="40" y="65" text-anchor="middle" font-size="9" fill="#2563eb" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Person</text>

system.name: System/Application
system.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="80" height="60" rx="6" fill="#6b7280" stroke="#4b5563" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="8" y="8" width="64" height="44" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.9"/><rect x="15" y="15" width="50" height="6" rx="3" fill="#6b7280"/><rect x="15" y="25" width="35" height="4" rx="2" fill="#9ca3af"/><rect x="15" y="32" width="45" height="4" rx="2" fill="#9ca3af"/><rect x="15" y="39" width="30" height="4" rx="2" fill="#9ca3af"/><text x="40" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-size="8" fill="#4b5563" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">SYSTEM</text>

department.name: Department/Team
department.svg: <rect x="0" y="0" width="120" height="80" rx="8" fill="#a78bfa" stroke="#7c3aed" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/><rect x="10" y="10" width="100" height="60" rx="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.1"/><circle cx="30" cy="30" r="8" fill="#8b5cf6"/><circle cx="60" cy="30" r="8" fill="#8b5cf6"/><circle cx="90" cy="30" r="8" fill="#8b5cf6"/><circle cx="27" cy="27" r="3" fill="#ffffff"/><circle cx="57" cy="27" r="3" fill="#ffffff"/><circle cx="87" cy="27" r="3" fill="#ffffff"/><path d="M24 33 Q30 30 36 33 M54 33 Q60 30 66 33 M84 33 Q90 30 96 33" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="1" fill="none"/><text x="60" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-size="10" fill="#6d28d9" font-weight="bold" font-family="Arial, sans-serif">Department</text>
